poll_list.title: Moonshot Collective (MSC) S13 funding request
poll_list.body:
TLDR :
We are growing. We are tooling up. We’ve already shipped some bangers. We have many more planned…

We would like 130k GTC

Our goal is to focus on bringing the toolkit to market, validating new prototypes, onboarding new talent.

*Q1/Q2 OKR’s:*

*Objective: OP Partnership is successful.*
- KR: Jing decides to continue on with us after Q2 2022.
- Optimism chooses to use MC’s MVP to elect badge holders for their next round of RetroPGF
- Vitalik blogs about RGPF and mentions Gitcoin in it.

*Objective: dPopp is successful*
- KR: MVP of dPOPP launches by July 1 2022
- Can integrate with POH + BrightID
- At least 100 users have connected their identity.

*Objective: CPK successful*
- CPK used by emu to pay moonshot devs.
- 6 DAOs using CPK by July 1.

*Objective: Innovation Factory*
- ICs/Developers are happy.
- Increase active devs by 50% (+7)
- We are good at validating opportunities.
- We are good at building validated opportunities (achieving product market fit).
choices: Do not fund MSC as requested
poll_list.author: 0xc2E2B715d9e302947Ec7e312fd2384b5a1296099
